1379010.name: Untale: King of Revinia Demo
1379010.description:
Medieval Revinia… Tiny peaceful kingdom at the ends of the earth…

One night changes it forever… One mysterious death. One ancient curse.

Did King Gerard just die in his bed? Could it be a conspiracy? Maybe, the ancient curse of the Prayer Statue worked out?

Now it’s YOU to take the reins of power. Who else is to govern Revinia , if it’s not the son of the dead king?

What relations will YOU establish with the nobles? Will your people like you? Will you find your love when everything is in a state of chaos? Each step is unique. You’re to assemble a life puzzle, but be wise - YOUR CHOICE HAS POWER.

13 influential characters with different tempers and purposes and more than 14 different endings!

Open the door to Medieval Revinia’s world and you’ll find out:
- how your coronation will go;
- what will be the first days of your ruling;
- whether the ancient curse is worth dreading;
- if you find your true love;
- WHAT really KILLED KING Gerard…

We guarantee you’ll like it as:
- game plot is more than just elaborate, THE POWER OF YOUR CHOICE governs here...
- story will keep you very interested until the end;
- arts and graphics are vivid and detailed, inspiring and eye-pleasing;
- music is composed specially for the novel;
- jokes and funny dialogues will make you laugh (our writers and editors think about you).
1379010.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
